page.title: 10Rieondel Cattery.
page.content: Mr. Raymond Sealy's interest in breeding cats encouraged him to open a cattery. Cats are boarded there whilst their owners are away from home. During the high season as many as 18 cats are catered for at the cattery. The name {Rieondel}is made up from the names of Mr.Sealy and his wife Marie Elizabeth. The cattery is clean,caring and safe,with ample facilities for the cats. It also has proper facilities for breeding cats. Mr. Sealy has three cats of his own, a male stud cat and two females. He regularly 'shows' his cats and their show names all start with {RIEON.} (Group A.) V.J. & C.B.
